page.title: 19HARTHAM PARK, HERTFORD
page.content: Hartham is a pleasant park surrounded by rivers and trees.It has always been a place where anyone can go. In summer people visit the{open air pool,}heated by solar panels.It is 33x13 metres and costs 30p for children.Another popular facility is{tennis}with 6 private and 4 public courts at Â£1.40 for adults or 60p for children. People also pay for {bowling,putting}or{pitch-and-put}golf. There are football pitches, a fenced off adventure{play area}for youngsters and open grassland for games. Locals stroll through the park or take their dogs for a walk. Othes enjoy{fishing, flying kites and model planes or spend lunchtime relaxing from work. Families come several miles for{a day out.}They can picnic by rivers, clean enough for paddling. Most visitors are satisfied with Hartham but some want more seats, an indoor pool or cafes to buy a meal.
